original_title: Galapagos: Secrets of the Ocean Giants
overview: In the Galapagos Islands, a group of scientists works to understand the movements of the world's largest fish - the whale shark. Without understanding their breeding and migrations, we cannot hope to protect them. The scientists of the Galapagos Whale Shark Project head north to Darwin Island to uncover the secrets of these ocean giants.
title: Galapagos: Secrets of the Ocean Giants
